articles.title: What insiders are predicting for the Red Sox in free agency this offseason
articles.description:
Boston is predicted to be in the mix for a handful of the top free agents this offseason.

The post What insiders are predicting for the Red Sox in free agency this offseason appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Red Sox expected to pursue top free agents this offseason, enhancing team competitiveness.
Insiders predict significant signings could occur by December 2023, impacting roster strength.
Potential acquisitions may energize Boston fans and boost attendance at Fenway Park.
